verses.name: Amos 6:1
verses.text: Woe to them that are at ease in Zion, and trust in the mountain of Samaria, which are named chief of the nations, to whom the house of Israel came!

verses.name: Amos 6:2
verses.text: Pass ye unto Calneh, and see; and from thence go ye to Hamath the great: then go down to Gath of the Philistines: be they better than these kingdoms? or their border greater than your border?

verses.name: Amos 6:3
verses.text: Ye that put far away the evil day, and cause the seat of violence to come near;
